name: ai-paper-reviewer
description: Intelligent submission analysis with event-aware criteria, duplicate detection, and confidence thresholds
author: CFP Directory

aiProvider.title: AI Provider
aiProvider.description: The AI provider to use for paper analysis

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for the selected AI provider

model.title: Model
model.description: The AI model to use (options depend on provider)

useEventCriteria.title: Use Event Review Criteria
useEventCriteria.description: When enabled, uses the event's configured review criteria and weights

strictnessLevel.title: Review Strictness
strictnessLevel.description: Controls how strict the AI reviewer is

customPersona.title: Custom Persona (Optional)
customPersona.description: Additional persona instructions for the AI reviewer

enableDuplicateDetection.title: Duplicate Detection
enableDuplicateDetection.description: Check for similar submissions in the same event

enableSpeakerResearch.title: Speaker Research
enableSpeakerResearch.description: Research speaker background (requires additional API calls)

confidenceThreshold.title: Confidence Threshold
confidenceThreshold.description: Hide recommendations below this confidence level

lowConfidenceBehavior.title: Low Confidence Behavior
lowConfidenceBehavior.description: What to do when AI confidence is below threshold

autoReview.title: Auto-Review New Submissions
autoReview.description: Automatically trigger AI review when a new submission is created
